column4: Hi there, I've got a problem with my Ubuntu 6.06 setup where xvinfo cannot find any adaptors, therefore causing video to be pixellated when viewed fullscreen. I have a Radeon X800XL using the fglrx drivers. Can anyone help me?
How do I do that, ThePub?
What IRC client do you guys recommend? All I want is something that looks nice and connects to multiple networks.
